name: Andronikos_Revel%27s_father
content:
The father of Andronikos Revel was a male Human living during the Great Galactic War. He was the father of Andronikos Revel and used to run a small shop on a backwater planet. He once shot his then-six year old son in the foot for crying.
Andronikos Revel's father is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Andronikos Revel companion mission.
